Name: Help Another
Effect: Target One Ally. Roll your Accuracy as if it were Chance dice. Add 1 die to the Accuracy Roll of your Ally for each Success (result of 6) obtained this way. Up to 3 Characters may attempt to help a single Action. Up to 6 Dice may be added this way.
Description: Not being the best suited for a task doesn’t mean you won’t do your part in helping out. The best teams work together!
